page.title: 17SUNDAY SCHOOL - ATTITUDES
page.content:
I go to Sunday School because I like hearing stories about God and every year we go on trips. Every Easter, we go to another Church for a special service. We have an Anniversary at Harvest time and at Christmas we have a play. (Ceri Morgan)
I have never been to Sunday School before. I don't want to go because none of my friends go and I have no-one to walk up with. My Mam has tried to talk me into going but I decided not to. I prefer to go to the park with my friends on Sunday. (Nicola Horton) I used to go to Sunday School, but my Mam will not let me go any more because I used to come home late. I used to mess about on the way home. I don't mind because it wasn't really my kind of school anyway. (Alan Pearce)
